text: 元広島・古葉竹識氏死去 85歳 75年「赤ヘル旋風」で広島リーグ初V導く 日本一3度の名将 was a Japanese professional baseball player and manager. He was known for playing and managing the Hiroshima Carp from 1958 until 1969 and 1975 until 1985, respectively. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese baseball players
title: Takeshi Koba
